divs: Sighting DetailsWalking around neighborhood and noticed 4 stationary pulsating obs. They were an orange hue. 3 continued to disappear and reappear. the 3 orbs disappeared and one remained for around 5 minutes until also disappearing.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cornelius
There were no other sightings in Cornelius on or around January 26th 2013
Summary: Pulsating orbs or orange light, Disappeared & reappeared
